abstract: Baritone Mariusz Kwiecien plans to return to the stage of the Metropolitan Opera after emergency back surgery forced him to miss performances of opera Don Giovanni.
snippet: The baritone Mariusz Kwiecien plans to return to the Met stage Tuesday after disc surgery forced him to miss performances of “Don Giovanni.”
lead_paragraph: The baritone Mariusz Kwiecien plans to return to the Met stage Tuesday after disc surgery forced him to miss performances of “Don Giovanni.”

headline.main: Baritone Returns to Fighting Trim for Met ‘Don Giovanni’
headline.print_headline: Baritone Returns to Fighting Trim at the Met
headline.seo: Mariusz Kwiecien on the Mend for ‘Don Giovanni’ at the Met
